verses.verse: Am <S%G1510><s%> I not free <S%G1658><s%>? Am <S%G1510><s%> I not an apostle <S%G652><s%>? Have I not seen <S%G3708><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> our Lord <S%G2962><s%>? Are you not my work <S%G2041><s%> in the Lord <S%G2962><s%>?

Or <S%G2228><s%> is He speaking <S%G3004><s%> altogether <S%G3843><s%> for our sake <S%G1223><s%>? What <S%G5101><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> is my reward <S%G3408><s%>?
